name: Leeds drinking water
desc:
Drinking water points marked on OpenStreetMap.

You can help improve the map by adding drinking water points to OpenStreetMap. You need an account (it is free) and then the data will be open for everyone to use. Just be sure to tag the points as amenity=drinking_water and we'll get your update within a day or so. There are other tags you can add such as indoor=yes and bottle=*.
